resume.position: Менеджер по работе с дистрибьюторами, директор по работе с партнерами

experience.description: Общее руководство отделом непрямых продаж торговой марки Импульс, построение канала непрямых продаж, руководство разработкой продуктовых линеек, включая взаимодействие с производственными площадками.

industries.name: Industrial, Domestic Electrical Appliances and Electronics (Promotion, Wholesale)
Industrial, Domestic Electrical Appliances and Electronics (Manufacturing)

experience.description:
Key responsibilities:

•	General management of Powercom Representative Office in Russia
•	Achieving planned revenue and country P&L control
•	Performing long-term business planning 

Major achievements:

•	Increased overall sales by 200% from 2004 to 2012 (an average of 25% year to year growth)
•	Increased the number of distributors from 4 in 2004 to 7 in 2008 and the quantity of active resellers by 30%
•	Expanded the territory of representation to Belarus and Kazakhstan 
•	Improved economic efficiency by costs reduction, resources optimization
•	Powercom ranks third in terms of revenue in Russian local UPS market according to IT-research agency.
•	Powercom was constantly awarded by CRN Channel Champions Award Russia –  2nd place in 2008, 4th place in 2010, 3rd place in 2012 and 2014

Responsibilities: general channel management: worked with Russian distributors (from 4 to 7 distributors in Russia), controlled profitability and margin, managed prices and products, set plans for distributors, made business forecasting, processed orders, managed channel conflicts, handled rebate programs.

Responsibilities: developed 2nd tier channel partners with primary focus on working with major partners, planned joint business, provided commercial support for major deals, managed channel conflicts, enabled authorization of 2nd tier partners, provided information support, budgeted joint marketing events and events for business partners.

Developed and implemented Compaq Authorized Reseller program in Russia.
 
Responsibilities: marketing, information and commercial support of 2nd tier authorized partners, establishing strong relationship with 2nd tier partners, increasing partners’ loyalty and regional partners’ development; planning, preparing and participating in partners’ joint` events.
